iso.description: Ubuntu is a widely used Linux distribution predominantly targeted at desktop users. It concentrates on usability, ease of installation, and working 'out of the box'.
iso.longdescription:
Alternate Install CDs: if your computer has less than 384MB of memory (RAM) using the alternate installation CD is recommended. The CD includes the operating system and the most common applications as in Live CD
A lot of other software can be downloaded automatically from the web (using Synaptic).
Ubuntu is sponsored by Canonical Ltd., a private company founded by South African entrepreneur Mark Shuttleworth.
